item.description:
David Lindahl! Wealth Advantages of Apartment Property Investing 

 

Dave  Lindahl will share secrets on how he is investing to make the most money in the best aspect of Real Estate right now….Apartments.

You’ll learn:

· How to create over $10,000 per month cash flow in your pocket...and become a multi-millionaire In 5 years or less!

·  The dangerous myths some real estate gurus teach about “no money down” investing ...and how to do “no money down” the right way.

·  ...how you can get massively wealthy while dealing with absolutely no tenants at all!

· How to recognize market cycles and use them to become wealthy fast.

· Plus much more, including all of your questions!

 

 

Dave Lindahl is one of America's most successful, hands-on, real estate investors. He has written 3 best selling books: "Commercial Real Estate Investing 101" co-authored with Donald Trump,"Emerging Real Estate Markets" and "Multi-Family Millions". Dave calls himself "a burned-out landscaper" who 14 years ago made the decision to become financially independent. When Dave started, he had a total of $800 in the bank. After years of pushing around dirt and railroad ties in his landscaping business, he was exhausted.

Lacking any experience, his family told him, "Dave, you’re making a big mistake." Over time, he developed and tested to perfection his self-created real estate system. One of his key areas of focus over 14 years of doing deals was finding money to invest. Other investors have lost money in the past two years while Dave has quickly amassed a fortune through his real estate deals. Today he controls over a quarter of a Billion dollars in real estate across the country.

 

[b]NHREIA March Monthly Meeting When: 6:30 pm, Wednesday June 8, 2011   Where: Best Western Executive Court, 13500 South Willow Street, Manchester Cost: Free for NHREIA members; only $20 for visitors and meetup members[/b]
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
